messages.noResults: 暂无结果。提交请求后可查看结果。

matchResume.title: 简历与JD匹配
matchResume.subtitle: 分析候选人简历与职位描述的匹配度
matchResume.resultsSubtitle: 候选人与岗位匹配的综合分析
matchResume.resumePlaceholder:
Paste resume content here...

Example:
John Doe
Senior Software Engineer
john.doe@email.com

EXPERIENCE:
Google (2019-2024) - Senior Software Engineer
- Led team of 5 engineers
- Built React dashboard for 10M+ users

SKILLS: Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, AWS

EDUCATION:
MIT - BS Computer Science, 2017
matchResume.jdPlaceholder:
Paste job description here...

Example:
Senior Software Engineer at TechCorp
Location: San Francisco, CA

About the role:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to lead our backend team.

Required Qualifications:
- 5+ years of software engineering experience
- Expert-level Python programming
- Strong experience with React

Nice to have:
- AWS or cloud infrastructure experience
- Machine Learning background

Responsibilities:
- Lead technical design decisions
- Mentor junior engineers
matchResume.errorMissing: 请提供简历和职位描述
